title: Cloudflare Workers
extract: Cloudflare Workers let you run JavaScript in Cloudflare's hundreds of data centers around the world. Using a Worker, you can modify your site's HTTP requests and responses, make parallel requests, or generate responses from the edge. Load balance between multiple origins to improve speed or reliability.
extract_html: Cloudflare Workers let you run JavaScript in Cloudflare's hundreds of data centers around the world. Using a Worker, you can modify your site's HTTP requests and responses, make parallel requests, or generate responses from the edge. Load balance between multiple origins to improve speed or reliability.
